name: Big Rush
description:
Easy to play, yet hard to master !

HOW TO PLAY

- Tap to start

- Run towards the crowd

- Collect same color crowd

- Merge as huge as you can

- Collect gold

- Clash against giant run bosses

- Conquer giant castle

- Avoid dangerous hurdles and obstacles

- Dodge different color enemies

- Enemies will downsize you

- Size up as you merge with same color force

- Take the shortcut path
